material: steel with chrome plating, rubber/foam grip
usage: strength training exercises for arms, shoulders, back, core, and other muscle groups
key_features: The chrome coating gives the weights a premium feel with a texture that anti-slip
handles will not bend or break after repeated use
Foam covered handles provides additional grip while exercising
Helps build strength in key areas like your shoulders, back, core, biceps/ triceps and other muscle groups
ai_description: A set of two compact dumbbells featuring silver chrome-plated steel ends with the KAKSS brand and weight (1KG or 2.5KG) stamped prominently. The handles are covered in black textured rubber/foam for enhanced grip. The dumbbells have a classic hexagonal shape at the ends to prevent rolling. Images show them in studio settings on white backgrounds and in lifestyle shots being used in gym environments. Packaging highlights exercise examples like arm workouts, sidebends, and planks.
target_audience: beginners and professionals for home or gym use
